summary: The Golden Gate Bridge is a famous suspension bridge in San Francisco, California. It connects the city to Marin County, spanning the Golden Gate Strait. The bridge is known worldwide as a symbol of San Francisco and is considered one of the modern wonders of engineering. It opened in 1937 and was the longest and tallest suspension bridge at the time. The bridge is beautiful and very popular for photos, carrying cars, pedestrians, and bikes. It has undergone many improvements since its construction.
title: Golden Gate Bridge
